name: Adicio
tag_list: job-board, job-board-software, recruitment, online-recruitment, online-real-estate, real-estate-classifieds, real-estate-classified-software, online-automotive, automotive-classifieds, automotive-classified-software, online-classifieds, online-classified-
overview:
Adicio develops interactive classified advertising software solutions for job boards, real estate, and automotive markets.

Adicio delivers a white-label application that integrates within online classified advertising offerings, enabling clients to generate revenue and retain their brand while building and managing their online classified efforts. Clients can deploy Adicioâ€™s software as a turnkey solution or customize Adicioâ€™s application to leverage existing brand strategy and support online sales and marketing objectives. Adicio also powers CareerCast.com, a job search portal and JobsRated.com, where 200 jobs across North America are ranked based on detailed analysis of specific careers factors.

Clients include International Data Group (IDG), Hearst Newspapers, Conley Publishing, Albuquerque Publishing Group, The San Diego Union-Tribune, The Seattle Times Company, Gatehouse Media, Inc., The Institution of Engineering and Technology, Advanstar Communications, Raycom Media, and the Denver Post.
